## Properties

| Property           | Attribute | Description  | Type                                                       | Default     |
| ------------------ | --------- | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`              | `alt`     | Alt text     | `string`                                                   | `''`        |
| `fit`              | `fit`     | Object fit   | `"contain" \| "cover" \| "fill" \| "none" \| "scale-down"` | `'cover'`   |
| `lazy`             | `lazy`    | Lazy loading | `boolean`                                                  | `false`     |
| `src` _(required)_ | `src`     | Image source | `string`                                                   | `undefined` |
